constituent: contraption, tree, wood, commandments, two hands, fiesta
koohiiStory1: The ten commandments were heavy. So to help carry them, Moses made a wooden contraption; the ark of the covenant.
koohiiStory2: Think of a complex wooden contraption capable of giving you a two-handed fiesta.
myStory: thiết bị. máy móc. dụng cụ. cây ra lệnh là thiết bị.
